edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe

Class WebServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.library.cantaloupe.WebServer

  • public class WebServer
extends java.lang.Object

    Provides the web server in standalone mode.

    This class is not used (and may not even be available) when running in a Servlet container.
